title: Update a Customer Account
description: A customer has a new shipping address and it needs to be updated in their account.

tasks.description: Find the customer's account in the CRM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the correct customer account.

tasks.description: Add the new address to the customer's list of shipping locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately enters the new address details.

tasks.description: Set the new address as the default shipping address for future orders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the customer's preferences to use the new address by default.
